Just duplicate this file and have fun.


What I'm calling "smart accordions" are accordions that once you click on them to expand, they will push the bottom accordion down to create space for the description of the open accordion without having to create multiple frames and component variations like we used to have to do and that's pretty neat!


I hope you find this helpful, let me know if you have any questions about it. Feel free to comment below, on youtube or reach me on twitter.
